== Kubuntu 15.04 to 15.10 Upgrade ==

You will need to:
* Ensure your laptop is connected to power.
* Ensure 15.04 is updated.
* Run the release upgrade tool.
* Reboot.

=== Ensure your laptop is connected to power ===

=== Ensure 15.04 is updated ===

==== Run Muon Update Manager ====

Use <alt> <F2> to bring up krunner, and type muon and select Muon Update Manager

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot1.png]]</nowiki>

----

==== Select Install Updates ====

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot2.png]]</nowiki>

----

==== Install additional software ====

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot3.png]]</nowiki>

----

==== Supply your sudo password ====

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot4.png]]</nowiki>

----

==== Wait for updates to install ====

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot5.png]]</nowiki>

----

==== Re-boot if suggested ====

=== Run Muon Update Manager Again ===

{{http://people.ubuntu.com/~jr/14.10-upgrade/kubuntu-5.png}}

Restart Muon Update Manager and it will notify you of an upgrade, click "Upgrade".

----

==== Supply your sudo password ====

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot7.png]]</nowiki>

----

==== The Release Upgrade tool will be downloaded and started ====

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot8.png]]</nowiki>

----

==== Allow the upgrade to start ====

Select Upgrade.

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot9.png]]</nowiki>

----

Then Start Upgrade; it will download and install 15.10.

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot10.png]]</nowiki>

----

==== Wait (approximately an hour) ====

Enjoy a cup of coffee.

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot11.png]]</nowiki>

----

=== Restart your computer ===

It will ask you to restart your computer. Ensure you have no unsaved work open and click Restart Now.

----

== Welcome to Kubuntu 15.10 ==

Your computer should boot into Kubuntu 15.10, with the new Plasma 5.4.1 desktop

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot12.png]]</nowiki>
